question:
A developer chooses to avoid using SingleThreadModel but wants to ensure that data is updated in a thread safe manner.
Which two can support this design goal? (Choose two)

options.A: Store the data in a local variable.
options.C: Store the data in the Httpsession object.
options.B: Store the data in an instance variable.
options.E: Store the data in the ServletRequest object.
options.D: Store the data in the sarvletContext object.
